labels.textDrag: Drag and drop documents inside the dotted area or upload files from your local drive using the appropriate button.

abort.modalDescription: By clicking "Confirm" you will exit the wizard.

404.title: Page or Resource Not Found
404.message:
When typing the web address, ensure it is correct.

If you have copied the web address, make sure the entire address is correct.

If the web address is correct but the error still persists, please contact the help desk.

500.title: Internal server error
500.message: An internal server error has occured
